com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors

Class AndroidInputProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors.GameInputProcessor
        • com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors.AndroidInputProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class AndroidInputProcessor
extends GameInputProcessor
    InputProcessor for Android case: This class is only called when the Running Platform is Android.
